I checked your shopping account and available discounts so I could try to handle this for you. Summary of what I found and next steps I can take:

What I checked
- Current date (from the platform): 2024-05-19.
- Order history (your account): I found these recent orders:
  - ORDER-104674 — Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt (P030) — 2024-04-18
  - ORDER-107495 — TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse (P045) — 2024-05-06
  - ORDER-112543 — Portable SSD 1TB (P009) — 2024-05-19
- I did NOT find any order in your account for running shoes placed today (or any order that lists a running-shoes product_id).
- Available discount codes on your account: SPRING10 — 90% off.
- Product search (Sports > running/shoes) shows relevant running-shoe items including:
  - P024 — Adidas Running Shoes — $80.49 — rating 4.4
  - P025 — PUMA Running Shoes — $102.99 — rating 4.1
  - (other models also listed)

Because I could not find a running-shoes order in your account, I cannot issue a refund for it. I can proceed with either (A) locating the order if you can give me its order ID, or (B) repurchasing the shoes for you now and applying your SPRING10 discount.

Actions I can take now (pick one or tell me which to proceed with)
1) If you provide the order ID for the running-shoes purchase (or the order confirmation email/invoice), I will:
   - Refund that specific order (the refund will go to your linked bank account).
   - Rebuy the same shoes using your SPRING10 discount code.

2) If you want me to repurchase immediately (no original-order refund needed / original order not found), tell me:
   - Which product you want me to buy (product_id or brand/model). Quick choices from search: P024 (Adidas) or P025 (PUMA).
   - Quantity (default 1).
   - Any size and color preference (if applicable).

If you want me to proceed now with a specific product (e.g., P025, quantity 1) I will add it to the cart and complete checkout applying SPRING10. If you instead prefer I locate the original order first, please paste the order ID or forward the order confirmation/invoice and I’ll handle the refund + repurchase.

Which option should I take? (If you want me to pick for you, say which model — P024 or P025 — and the size.)
